sentences.sContent: The best archer would be awarded a golden arrow.
sentences.sContent_eng: The best archer would be awarded a golden arrow.
sentences.sCn: 最优秀的弓箭手将获得一只金箭。

sentences.sContent: Yes. It was a skillful archer who saved the earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes. It was a skillful archer who saved the earth.
sentences.sCn: 是的。 是一个熟练的弓箭手拯救了地球。

sentences.sContent: The Emperor ordered a famous archer to shoot down the nine extra suns.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Emperor ordered a famous archer to shoot down the nine extra suns.
sentences.sCn: 皇帝命令一个著名的弓箭手射下九个多余的太阳。

remMethod.val: arch(弓) + er → 弓箭手； arch本身是一个单词， 意为“使…弯成弓形”

words.tran: 拱形的；有拱的；弓形结构的
成弓形弯曲；成弓形（arch的过去分词形式）
成弓形弯曲；成弓形（arch的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: someone who shoots  arrow s  from a  bow
